roleset.name: complain
roleset.note: KVETCH-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from kvetch.01-v)

example.name: All args
example.text: I quietly kvetched to my wife that my favorite physicist was coming to town.
example.arg: that my favorite physicist was coming to town

example.name: No ARG2
example.text: My mother kvetched all day about the cheesecake being undercooked.

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: Brandy kvetched the entire time that they should be doing morse code.
example.arg: the entire time that they should be doing morse code
